summary.description:
An Exploration into the Opportunities for Blockchain in the Fresh Produce Supply Chain.

Festival of Content & Collaboration.

Blockchain Live 2020 is a festival of content & collaboration, driving discussion & debate on how best to accelerate global adoption of blockchain & DLT.

Blockchain Live is a ground-breaking festival of content and collaboration that connects the fragmented ecosystem to drive meaningful discussion and debate on how best to accelerate global adoption of blockchain.
